name: Taurus Marketing
tag_list: public-relations, marketing, social-media, personal-brand, entrepreneur, b2b
overview:
Taurus is an Australian based, privately owned, integrated strategic marketing, PR and social media agency servicing the B2B sector.

Founded by Sharon Williams in 1995, Peter Kazacos of the KAZ Group was our founding client. Since then Taurus has assisted over 1000 companies across multiple industries. The company works closely with clients ranging from smart entrepreneurs to major ASX-listed corporations domestically and overseas.

With a team of 20 specialised professionals, Taurus comprises a select team of professional Marketing, PR and Creative minds, including ex in-house experienced Marketing Management as well as Senior Agency Account Directors and Creative talent.

Taurus has received various awards for excellence for creative, marketing and PR services. Most recently in 2010, Taurus was awarded the State and National Golden Target Awards for PR and Marketing excellence for its Jesus, All About Life campaign for the Bible Society. This was the biggest ever marketing and advertising campaign from the Christian community in Australia.

Taurus Marketing has its own unique integrated agency model which offers a multitude of services under the one roof. This includes PR, marketing, creatives and two trademarked services: TaurusProfileâ„¢, which helps clients define and protect their personal brand on and offline; TaurusEngageâ„¢, which assists clients in setting appropriate social media strategy and engagement.
